author: sagara.x
content:
Hello guys, 

Hope you are all doing well. 

I have designed a solution that prevents smart contract hacks in a decentralised and reliable manner. I want to ensure that no similar ideas have been proposed in the past and to gauge interest before I write the EIP.

to make it short - the solution is a decentralised firewall, part of the execution client, that analyses every transaction for potential hacks. It leverages the EVM to make reverting transactions as transparent and decentralised as possible.
